update npc
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RACE = #{race,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STRENGTH = #{strength,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEXTERITY = #{dexterity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INTELLIGENCE = #{intelligence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LUCK = #{luck,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HEALTH = #{health,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RELATED_EVENTS = #{relatedEvents,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where UID = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update npc set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RACE = #{race,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STRENGTH = #{strength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEXTERITY = #{dexterity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INTELLIGENCE = #{intelligence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LUCK = #{luck,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HEALTH = #{health,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RELATED_EVENTS = #{relatedEvents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UID = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
